name: Demonslayer
text: Embodiments of chaos and cruelty, demons are an affront to your faith, and you seek to destroy them at every opportunity. You have received special blessings and learned battle prayers that are anathema to the denizens of the Abyss. Your attacks pierce their unholy defenses, and simply being near you causes them pain. You won’t rest until every demon is dead.

features.demonslayer'sAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to make an attack, the attack deals extra damage equal to one-half your level and ignores resistances
features.demonslayer'sPresence(11thLevel): Any demon that starts its turn adjacent to you takes damage equal to your Wisdom modifier
features.suppressResistance(16thLevel): When you hit a creature that has variable resistance with a melee attack, you negate the resistance until the end of the creature’s next turn

flavorText: Run back to the Abyss and tell them I’m coming. Let them prepare their defenses and raise their armies. I look forward to obliterating them all!
